short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The New York Times: Read breaking opinions from nytimes.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our new The NYT Opinion Notifier you will always stay tuned about commentary and analysis on various issues, diverse perspectives on current events, politics, culture, and society. 
Our Browser Extension follows the NYT website Section, finds new content and send you a notification about the fact. This NYT Section has some main features you cannot and won't miss with our Notifier:
•	Diverse Voices
•	Columns and Editorials
•	Letters to the Editor
•	Focus on Current Events
•	Engagement with Readers
•	Variety of Formats
Our aim is to to help The NYT readers navigate complex issues by offering informed perspectives and stimulating critical thinking
